welcome_message_body: Welcome to Spanish Town, Jamaica! Get ready to explore the rich history and vibrant culture of this charming city, known for its beautiful architecture and lively atmosphere. We hope you enjoy your time here and take in all that Spanish Town has to offer.

restaurants.name: Juici Patties
restaurants.description: Juici Patties is a fast food restaurant located in Spanish Town.
restaurants.address: Oasis Shopping Mall (March Pen Road), Spanish Town, Parish of Saint Catherine

restaurants.name: Hot One (readi soup)
restaurants.description: Hot One (readi soup) is a food truck located in the city.

restaurants.name: Sharmz Restaurant & Lounge
restaurants.description: Sharmz Restaurant & Lounge is a caribbean restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Jamanda's
restaurants.description: Jamanda's is a caribbean restaurant located in Spanish Town.
restaurants.address: Sagicor Shopping Centre, Spanish Town, St.Catherine

restaurants.name: Burger King
restaurants.description: Burger King is a fast food restaurant located in Spanish Town.
restaurants.address: Burke Rd., Spanish Town, Parish of Saint Catherine

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norman Manley Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Norman Manley Airport handles all domestic flights within Jamaica.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.
